what is a Zamboni all day long

resurfacer that is lesson number two the
history of the Zamboni Glen it started
right after World War Two Frank J
Zamboni owned an ice rink in Paramount
California before World War two they
used to get big shovels and they'd
scrape the ice and scrape the snow off
and then flood it with a hose it would
probably take an hour and a half
mr. Zamboni felt there had to be a
better way and after 60 years in
countless variations of the Zamboni here
was my machine still I had to wait a few
